headline: This Steel Stock Is an S&P 500 Top Performer Today. Here’s Why.
summary: Steel Dynamics  was the second-best performer in the  Tuesday after the company issued a solid outlook for the current quarter.  The Fort Wayne, Ind.-based steelmaker expects third-quarter earnings of $2.60 to $2.64 a share, up from $2.01 in the second quarter and $2.05 the year prior.  Management anticipates higher profitability from its steel operations, and earnings growth in its metals recycling segments and downstream steel fabrication segments.

headline: 1 Dividend King Stock That Just Got a Huge Endorsement from Billionaire Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway
summary: Shareholders can expect increasing dividend income while Nucor also enters a new stage of growth.

headline: Is Nucor Stock a Buy Following a Vote of Confidence From Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway?
summary: I've owned Nucor since 2015, so I think Warren Buffett is late to the game here. But that doesn't change the attractiveness of Nucor's business.
